name: Fairuz Kharida
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText:
I know that you're a great person, ramah, lembut, baik, yo cantik ya tentu saja, 
  but sometimes when you feeling so lost, hopeless and maybe broken, remember that there's so much people
  care about you, yo termasuk gua, so gua yakin dari semua masalah yang lu hadapin sebelumnya,sekarang dan mungkin nanti. Percaya deh bakal 
  ada orang-orang yang selalu support lu, jangan ngerasa gada siapa-siapa yah :) YOU DESERVE TO HAVE A HAPPY LIFE
